front.title: Security Automation and Continuous Monitoring (SACM) Architecture

abstract.t: This memo documents an exploration of a possible Security Automation and Continuous Monitoring (SACM) architecture. This work is built upon [I-D.ietf-mile-xmpp-grid], and is predicated upon information gleaned from SACM Use Cases and Requirements ([RFC7632] and [RFC8248] respectively), and terminology as found in [I-D.ietf-sacm-terminology].
